Welcome to my photo blog. I've seen other photo blogs and was intriqued with the new "hello" picture adder so thought I'd try it out with this blog. What I plan to do is since I am constantly taking photographs, I will share my favorites of the day here with you. I'd love to hear any comments/questions or queries you may have. The cameras I use are a Canon T50 with a Kiron 80-200mm lens. I use almost exclusively Fuji 100 film. The other camera is a Kodak EasyShare CX4200 digital my brother gave me when he upgraded. It is a great little camera for those looking for one but for more advanced photographers it has its limits. Here is a little insight about me. I am 42, married with two teenage sons. We live on a farm in NW/central Wisconsin where our main crop is hay and this year, corn. I raise horses, cattle and angora rabbits and we have the usual slew of critters from cats and dogs to a goat and a guinea pig. I am not a professional photographer. I have loved shooting pictures for as long as I can remember and once in awhile I get what I consider a good one. I've entered them in online contests and have won but they are usually prizeless which is ok. I have also hung photos at our local gallery. If I ever sold one I think I'd fall over dead, lol. Anyway, I hope you enjoy what I have here...
